Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Glioma that is low grade, has come back or did not respond to treatment, and has an abnormal BRAF gene. It is used in children aged 6 months and older.

Section.Para: Tovorafenib is approved under FDAâ€™s Accelerated Approval Program. As a condition of approval, confirmatory trial(s) must show that it provides a clinical benefit in these patients.
